name: Community Home Care Referral Service Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Home Care Referral Service Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $69.6M in Medicaid payments across 488K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $69.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
